subject: Brake spring
description_text:
Hey,

I have just received my new pedals and im very happy with my purchase. But i understand that there can be chanced some spring for the brake to make it less stiff. Im just a little confused on what to buy  sprung or Pro X Ultra Pedals Upgrade Kit

conversations.body_text: Hi Magnus Als Tonnisen Larsen,      If you feel the pedal brake too stiff, you can first adjust the hydraulic rod to 0, or purchase some white elastomer and springs. You don't need to buy an upgrade kitâ€”that's for the correct older pedal models. Yours is the latest version.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/elastomer    https://www.simsonn.com/products/sprung
Hi Magnus Als Tonnisen Larsen,    I noticed you purchased a set of older blue elastomers with a hardness rating of 90HA, which is harder than the 50HA red elastomers you already have. Please confirm.
